amendment.description: Manager's amendment strikes sections 401 and 403 to ensure compliance with House Rules relating to provisions regarding appropriated funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-504 to strike sections 401 and 403 to ensure compliance with House Rules relating to provisions regarding appropriated funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (MI) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rogers (MI) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Rogers (MI).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
